body:
Hey guys I am here with a new topic. Today I want to talk about an Avicus application, this is just an idea what came up in my head so please give feedback!! I can understand that its hard to make but still, would it not be awesome if we had an Avicus application (for Android and IOS). So all of the mobile website users can just click on the application, logg in and do, what they want to do. One thing that I would love to have in the app. Is a pop-up notification for your subscriptions and your own posts.
If you guys think this is a good idea or not please give me feedback!

Beyrdo (Budah)

replies.body:
Well, if you have an iPhone or an Apple product, you could just log into the forums from Safari. Otherwise, if you're on an Android, you can just go on Google and log into the forums.

I disagree with you for now unless you show up some good ideas for the app.
Also, about the pop-up thingy, there is already an alert in the forums, not really an alert but for example, if someone wrote something in your post, a number 1 and so on pops-up in the "My Discussions" section.

If you can add more info, I can give more feedback but that's all I can say for now.

I have an android device, and what I do is just go on the forums, click settings (for my browser), and "create bookmark".
This just makes a link directly to the forums, and it appears on my screen where I put all of my apps.
This, to me, is basically the same thing as an app. :)
